Web RPC Support RPC support for a Web Application

This module allows for a highly focused scenario, of supporting RPC operations within a Web API application. The module takes care of producing the appropriate interceptor to handle the RPC commands along with the ability to generate the appropriate client to be used to interact with the RPC functionality. The client uses Proxy-based objects, along with Typescript magic to create a dynamic client that is not generated.

CLI - web:rpc

The library will create the RPC client in one of three flavors: fetch, fetch + node, angular.
